alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 16 at 5:40PM PDT until April 16 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 2000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches through this evening. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Northern Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; Northern Oregon Cascades
